meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be altered or changed.
meanings.sent1: The alterability of the dress allowed it to be easily adjusted for a perfect fit.
meanings.sent2: The alterability of the recipe made it simple to customize to different tastes.
meanings.sent3: The alterability of the weather forecast kept changing, making it hard to plan the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her alterability in decision-making was like a chameleon, adapting to each situation.
meanings.sent5: The alterability of the clay sculpture made it a versatile medium for artistic expression.
